summary:
The Vendred are a race created by Nocturnal.She wanted stronger servants so she shared her blood with mortals.The Vendreds are ultimate assassins and created for thievery .
Legend tells they can become a shadow wich can kill you from everywhere.
descriptionHtml:
Here  is a complet rework of my Vendred Epidemic mod. 

The Vendred are a race created by Nocturnal.She wanted stronger servants so she shared her blood with mortals.The Vendreds are ultimate assassins and created for thievery .
Legend tells they can become a shadow wich can kill you from everywhere.

To become a Vendred you need to find Vendred Blood or just go to Nocturna in the ragged Flaggon,she will become your Follower, she gots Vendred Blood in her Inventory drink it and you will become a Vendred.She also has a pair of Vendred armor and a dagger for you.She is marriable. 
Spells:
-Nocturnals Blessing(Stops time) 
-Vendred Force (Pushs enemies away) 
-Vendred Grip(Grabs Actors and objects) 
-Vendred Hunter Sight(Shows potential Targets) 
-Vendred Night Eye 
-BoneCurse(Paralyses your target) 
-ShadowForm(Transform your self in a Shadow with a new Spell ,fortified sneak, stamina, health and magica) 

Enjoy
author: Eli
